description: Sum of odd primes dividing n.
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = 0 if p = 2, p otherwise.
mathematica: a = {0, 0}; For[n = 3, n < 80, n++, su = 0; b = FactorInteger[n]; For[i = 1, i < Length[b] + 1, i++, If[OddQ[b[[i, 1]]], su = su + b[[i, 1]]]]; AppendTo[a, su]]; a (* _Stefan Steinerberger_, Jun 02 2007 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
